thoughts.subject: Isolating the Indicator

The user's mention of a pre-existing battery applet and KDE configs now makes more sense; they likely have *both* Plasma and a COSMIC element active. My next step will be to examine the KDE settings to avoid conflicts when restoring the battery applet.

thoughts.subject: Diagnosing the Failure
